item.title: Welcome to the News Viewer
item.description:
Welcome to the PlayStation®Home News Reader!
Here you can find out about all of the new things in Home each day. Check the Star Tab to see what new happenings are taking place. You can also check the Commerce Tab to see what new items have been released.
This one-stop destination helps keep everyone on Home informed, so be sure to check back each Wednesday to see what’s new in PlayStation®Home! Also, Be sure to head to the Home forums to share your thoughts.
